#summary How to edit your settings.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Edit Settings =

There are 2 ways to open the settings menu.<br>
1. File->Settings<br>
2. Reight click on a contact -> Settings<br>

There are also 2 Tabs:
1. General:
 1.1 Profile-name: Enter your nickname here. For anonymity don't use your real name.<br>
 1.2 Profile-text: Here you can write stuff about you. Of course you don't need to fill it out.<br>
<br>
2. Advanced:	<br>
 2.1 Tor socks port: Here you need to set the port your Tor service listens to. If you use the portable Tor delivered with jTorChat use the default.<br>
 2.2 Local Port: Instead of 8975 you can set any unused port.<br>
 2.3 Our ID: This is your tor hidden services address. Only edit this if you use another tor than delivered.<br>
 2.4 Load Tor?: Check it if you want to use the portable Tor delivered with jTorChat.<br>
